ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lpival.p | |- P = ( LPIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | lpi1.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( RSpan ` R ) = ( RSpan ` R ) |
| 6 | 5, 2, 3 | #P_rsp1 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { ( 1r ` R ) } ) = B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( R e. Ring -> B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { ( 1r ` R ) } ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_sneq | |- ( g = ( 1r ` R ) -> { g } = { ( 1r ` R ) } ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( g = ( 1r ` R ) -> ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { g } ) = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { ( 1r ` R ) } ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( g = ( 1r ` R ) -> ( B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { g } ) <-> B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { ( 1r ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( ( 1r ` R ) e. B /\ B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { ( 1r ` R ) } ) ) -> E. g e. B B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { g } ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 7, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( R e. Ring -> E. g e. B B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { g } ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_islpidl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( B e. P <-> E. g e. B B = ( ( RSpan ` R ) ` { g } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_mpbird | |- ( R e. Ring -> B e. P ) |
